fields.label: Enable notification
fields.name: enable_notification
fields.instructions: This banner spans the top of the page.

fields.label: Feature items
fields.message: This section displays two, select news, blogs and pages, near the top of homepage. Once featured here, they will not display elsewhere on the homepage. The images displayed here, are pulled from the "feature image" of the particular item you've selected. Note: pages do not often have feature images, so you may need to add one in before featuring it here.

fields.label: Type
fields.name: post_type_list
fields.instructions: Filter Item based on post type.

fields.label: Select news article in Law Commission
fields.name: feature_item_left_news__lawcom

fields.label: Post Types:
fields.name: post_type_list_right
fields.instructions: Filter Item based on Post Type below.

fields.label: Enable banner
fields.name: enable_banner_right_side
fields.instructions: This banner appears in the "More on the intranet" section, right-hand column.

fields.label: Banner header
fields.name: banner_sidebar_header
fields.instructions: (optional - will not appear without banner image)

fields.label: Banner image
fields.name: homepage_sidebar_banner_image
fields.instructions: Recommended that the banner should be in a 3:2 or 1:1 ratio to fit best in space. Upload at the largest size possible.
